# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
function pig_latinify(texts::Vector{String})
    threads = Vector{Task}(undef, length(texts))
    for (i, text) in enumerate(texts)
        threads[i] = @async translate_to_pig_latin(text)
    end
    return fetch.(threads)
end

function translate_to_pig_latin(text::String)
    # Your code goes here...
    new_text = ""
    for word in split(text, ' ')
        first_letter = first(word)
        if isuppercase(first_letter)
            new_text *= uppercase(word[2:end]) * "ay"
        else
            new_text *= lowercase(word[1:end-1]) * "ay"
        end
    end
    return new_text
end
```
